text: Torsten Furukrantz (21 June 1937 – 12 September 2019) was a Swedish footballer who played as a defender for IFK Stockholm, Djurgårdens IF, and IK Sirius. ==Career== Furukrantz made his debut in the Swedish Division 2 with IFK Stockholm in 1959. He remained at the club until 1963 when he joined Djurgårdens IF. At Djurgården, he debuted in May 1963 against Hammarby IF. In 1964 he won Allsvenskan. In 1966, Furukrantz was one of five championship- winning players which signed with IK Sirius. He stayed at IK Sirius until 1973 and became a coach in 1974. ==Honours== Djurgårdens IF * Allsvenskan: 1964http://www.difarkivet.se/dif_sm_guld_seniorer.pdf ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Association football defenders Category:Swedish footballers Category:Allsvenskan players Category:IFK Stockholm players Category:Djurgårdens IF Fotboll players Category:IK Sirius Fotboll players
title: Torsten Furukrantz
